pages.text: Can Yttrium be put to other purposes? Perhaps if combined with a form of rock, it can be more easily shaped into different components? And what might I do with such components...?

pages.title: Processed Sheets
pages.text: Indeed, Yttrium has opened a path to industry, and these sheets are only the beginning. Though my initial technology is rudimentary, I am sure grander designs can come of this.
